definition: A form of compensation received in exchange for work or services rendered, typically provided on a regular basis, often monthly. It is commonly used to refer to the monetary payment received by employees for their labor.

examples.german: Der Lohn für seine harte Arbeit war ein neues Auto.
examples.english: The reward for his hard work was a new car.

examples.german: Sie verdient einen guten Lohn in ihrem neuen Job.
examples.english: She earns a good salary in her new job.

examples.german: Der Lohn für diese Aufgabe ist sehr hoch.
examples.english: The pay for this task is very high.

examples.german: Er arbeitet hart, aber sein Lohn ist nicht gerecht.
examples.english: He works hard, but his wage is not fair.

examples.german: Der Lohn wird am Ende des Monats ausgezahlt.
examples.english: The wage is paid at the end of the month.
